bookTitle: A Night in the Lonesome October
Plot: The bestselling author of the Amber series creates a delightful and dramatic period fantasy populated by talking dogs and characters from popular legend. Accompanying and amplifying the text are a series of 31 full-page illustrations by one of the masters of bizarre and horrific art.
Characters: Jack the Ripper, Snuff, the Watchdog, Crazy Jill, Greymalk, Morris and McCab, Nightwind, Rastov the Mad Monk, Quicklime, Needle, Owen, a Druid, Cheeter, Bubo the Rat, the Experiment Man, Larry Talbott, Vicar Roberts, Tequila the Raven, Lynette, the vicar's stepdaughter, Dracula, Sherlock Holmes, Victor Frankenstein
